privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when using our GuestHouse Haven app.
privacy.dataCollectionText: We collect user data such as email addresses, images uploaded, and interaction data for improving our services.
privacy.useInfoText: Your data is used for app functionality, personalized experiences, and service improvement.
privacy.dataSharingText: We do not sell your data. It is only shared with third-party services necessary for app functionality, such as Cloudinary for image hosting and Firebase.
privacy.securityText: We take security seriously and implement measures to protect your personal data.
privacy.userRightsText: You have the right to request data deletion or modification at any time. Contact us through the contact page.
privacy.agreement: By using our app, you agree to the terms in this Privacy Policy.

terms.providence: Our app provides the following features:
terms.accountsText: Some features may require an account. You agree to provide accurate information, keep your login credentials secure, and be responsible for activity under your account. We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts that violate these Terms.
terms.responsibilitiesText: Users must comply with all applicable laws and respect other users. You agree not to upload any content that is illegal, offensive, or violates intellectual property rights.

contentRules.rights: You have rights to the content you upload.
contentRules.noInfringement: Your content does not infringe on third-party rights.
contentRules.noOffensive: Your content is not offensive, illegal, or inappropriate.

terms.contentRemoval: We may remove content that violates these guidelines.
